analysis.description: AddressUtils.isContract (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol#184-201) is declared view but contains assembly code

	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol#350-358)

Reentrancy in CryptoFlowerRaiser.finalize (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.transferOwnership(owner) (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol)
karma in CryptoFlowerRaiser.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol#995) is a local variable never initialiazed

CryptoFlowerRaiser.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol#980-1005) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,generator,karma) (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol)

Reentrancy in CryptoFlowerRaiser.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol#980-1005):
	External calls:
	- generator = keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(block.coinbase,now,token.getGen(token.lastID()))) (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol)
	- token.mint(beneficiary,generator,karma) (/unique_chucks/21/0x90c2698721f9b96f23501f7a279137829cfc73b0.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
